publication.abstract: Summary: HyperTree is an application to visualize and navigate large trees in hyperbolic space. It includes color-coding, search mechanisms and navigational aids, as well as focus+context viewing, allowing enormous trees to fit within the fixed space of a computer screen or printed page.
publication.title: Visualizing large hierarchical clusters in hyperbolic space

summary.description: HYPERTREE is a Java phylogenetic tree viewer, with a hyperbolic (‘fish-eye’) view and editing abilities that help in managing very large trees.
summary.name: HyperTree
